name: Cop And Robber (HamsterCode)
description:
This was meant to be a starter project to get used to pygame. It's really not much, but it works and im proud of it.             

You can download if you want, but you need python with pygame installed to run it.

HOW TO PLAY:

move cop with WASD and robber with arrows.

The cop has to tag the robber in 10 seconds to win, otherwise the robber wins.

That's really it.
